actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB; Treasury Department.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the limitation on the interest deduction for interest paid or accrued on investment indebtedness from $10,000 to $25,000 for individuals with earned income.

summary.text: Interest Deduction Equity Act of 1981 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase to $25,000 the limitation on the income tax deduction for interest paid or accrued on investment indebtedness for individuals with earned income.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the limitation on the interest deduction for interest paid or accrued on investment indebtedness from $10,000 to $25,000 for individuals with earned income.
